param.name: show_ptype_during_reg
param.label: Allow User to Select Profile Type DURING Registration
param.description: If enabled we will show, choose your account during registration. If you disable it, a default usertype will be marked for user

param.name: jspt_allow_typechange
param.label: Allow User to Change Profile Type AFTER registration
param.description: You can disable account type selection/change During Edit Profile Detail

param.name: defaultProfiletypeID
param.label: Default Profiletype
param.description: All the existing user\'s before install multiple profiletype have no profile type set. Use this profiletype for those users

param.name: jspt_show_radio
param.label: During registration Show Choose Account Type as
param.description: You can disable account type selection/change During Edit Profile Detail

param.name: jspt_allow_templatechange
param.label: Allow Template Selection
param.description: You can enable/disable template selection/change During Edit Profile Detail

param.name: aecmessage
param.label: Display Message After Plan Selection
param.description: For those who is using AEC , Select what to display after plan selection

param.name: jspt_restrict_reg_check
param.label: Enable Restrict Registration Check
param.description: You can enable/disable template selection/change During Edit Profile Detail

param.name: jspt_prevent_username
param.label: Prevent these usernames from getting registered
param.description: Prevent these usernames from getting registered. Separate each one by ; character. Use * as wildcard. For example, you might want to deny usernames like webmaster; admin; info etc. You can use an asterisk (*) as a wildcard, so *webmaster* would block webmaster as well as thewebmaster, webmasters and so forth

param.name: jspt_allowed_email
param.label: Allow only these email addresses to get registered
param.description: Allow only these email addresses to get registered. Separate each one by ; character. Use * as wildcard. You can limit which email addresses that can be registered. For example, a company can set up a site where only its own employees can register by specifying *@mycompany.com; *@joomlaxi.com

param.name: jspt_reg_page2
param.label: Hide Profile Editing (Second Page) During Registration
param.description: If enabled, the second page will not be shown to user during registration.

param.name: jspt_reg_avatar
param.label: Hide Avatar-Selection-Page During Registration
param.description: If enabled, then Avatar Selection Page will not be shown to user during registration.
